snippet: Fashion industry leaders are opening up their wallets for President Obama, filling a crucial void in New York fund-raising circles left by Wall Street donors who remain leery of giving to the president.
abstract: Fashion industry leaders are opening up their wallets for President Obama, filling a crucial void in New York fund-raising circles left by Wall Street donors who remain leery of giving to the president.

headline.main: For Donors, $40,000 a Plate, and Don't Be Late
headline.print_headline: For Donors, $40,000 a Plate, and Don’t Be Late
